EmailTemplate.subject: Corian® Solid Surface: Acknowledgement registration of complaint {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer, Thank you for registering your complaint. We’ll do our utmost to have yourcomplaint solved in the shortest time possible.
Upon completion of your file, we will contact our service centre or IndustrialPartner to settle a date for an inspection / repair.
Our service centre / Industrial Partner will inspect the damage and if possible repair immediately. May we remind you to free up space and keep Corian® Solid Surface rest material available to avoid colour mismatch. Be aware that the intervention might cause inconveniences. If your request falls under the Corian® Solid Surface 10 Year Limited Installed Warranty, the cost of the intervention will be paid by DuPont. In case the damages fall outside this warranty, the service centre / Industrial Partner will make you an offer for repair. Upon completion, the service centre / Industrial Partner will ask you tosign a satisfaction form which serves as the confirmation for his services.
Should you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to contact us. Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}

services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal information (name,

United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates, partners, and selected third parties in other
countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend, delete or oppose to the processing of your information,
